publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4303 Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Kilbirnie Ladeside FC—That the Parliament congratulates Kilbirnie Ladeside Football Club, manager Tommy Bryce, the players, fans and everyone connected with the club on gaining promotion to the Stagecoach Super League Premier Division after a six-year absence; commends the efforts of the team for its magnificent achievement; wishes The Blasties the very best in future campaigns, and looks forward to the club’s continuing contribution to a strong and successful future for Scottish junior football.
S3M-4303 Congratulations to Kilbirnie Ladeside FC (lodged on 2 June 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, John Lamont*, Ross Finnie*

S3M-4303 Kenneth Gibson: Congratulations to Kilbirnie Ladeside FC—That the Parliament congratulates Kilbirnie Ladeside Football Club, manager Tommy Bryce, the players, fans and everyone connected with the club on gaining promotion to the Stagecoach Super League Premier Division after a six-year absence; commends the efforts of the team for its magnificent achievement; wishes The Blasties the very best in future campaigns, and looks forward to the club’s continuing contribution to a strong and successful future for Scottish junior football. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Stewart Maxwell, Bill Kidd, Stuart McMillan, John Lamont, Ross Finnie
S3M-4303 Congratulations to Kilbirnie Ladeside FC (lodged on 2 June 2009) Aileen Campbell*
S3M-4303 Congratulations to Kilbirnie Ladeside FC (lodged on 2 June 2009) Gil Paterson*, Jamie McGrigor*
